description: Detects potentially suspicious child processes of a ClickOnce deployment application
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Potentially Suspicious Child Process Of ClickOnce Application
query: (process.parent.executable.text:"*\\AppData\\Local\\Apps\\2.0\\*" AND process.executable.text:("*\\calc.exe" OR "*\\cmd.exe" OR "*\\cscript.exe" OR "*\\explorer.exe" OR "*\\mshta.exe" OR "*\\net.exe" OR "*\\net1.exe" OR "*\\nltest.exe" OR "*\\notepad.exe" OR "*\\powershell.exe" OR "*\\pwsh.exe" OR "*\\reg.exe" OR "*\\regsvr32.exe" OR "*\\rundll32.exe" OR "*\\schtasks.exe" OR "*\\werfault.exe" OR "*\\wscript.exe"))
